text:
"Rodya, you torment a defenceless girl," Marfa Petrovna said. 

Her letter moved me to tears. 

The servants spoke up. They knew more than Mr. Svidrigaïlov imagined. 

Marfa Petrovna was crushed. 

She prayed at the Cathedral, tears streaming down her face. 

“Forgive me, Dounia,” she begged, embracing her. 

The next day, she visited every house in town. 

“Dounia is innocent,” she declared, weeping. 

She shared Dounia’s letter, praising her nobility. 

Days passed, and Marfa worked tirelessly to restore Dounia’s name.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Marfa Petrovna's efforts to clear Dounia's name and restore her reputation lead to her public repentance and acknowledgment of Dounia's innocence.
